A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: after seeing this film 4 times... I finally feel I can give it a proper review. Pros: -Luke scenes -Action -THAT SOUND TRACK -The complexity of Kylo Ren -That call back -Taking risks Cons: -some comedy -some Leia stuff -The entire casino thing -Phasma -left with more questions than answers I really enjoyed the film\, but there were a few things that really irritated me. I get that Disney decided to take risk and make this different than other Star Wars movies\, but some of these things didn't work for me. Honestly\, I felt indifferent after seeing it the first time but after a second viewing I really enjoyed it. it has gotten better with every viewing. I am excited to see the direction they continue going because I really feel it is unpredictable.
